meanings.definition: A person who acts on behalf of another person or organization in negotiating contracts or representing them in various matters.
meanings.sent1: The superagent helped the company sign a new contract.
meanings.sent2: The superagent represented the artist in the negotiation.
meanings.sent3: The superagent walked into the room with a briefcase full of important papers.
meanings.sent4: She was like a superagent, swiftly closing deals left and right.
meanings.sent5: The superagent's skills were unmatched in the business world.

meanings.definition: A powerful or influential person who is highly skilled in their field.
meanings.sent1: As a superagent in the industry, he had connections everywhere.
meanings.sent2: The superagent's reputation preceded him wherever he went.
meanings.sent3: The superagent's office was always buzzing with activity.
meanings.sent4: She was a superagent in the world of fashion, setting trends effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The superagent's expertise was sought after by all major companies.
